contactContactType.description:
Determines the contact type

Indicates snail mail address (used for correspondence)
Indicates billing address (this address will appear on invoices)
Indicates contact used for a payment method (this address is used when charging a payment method)
contactContactType.title: Contact Type

contactGlobalSpecType.description:
Instance of one single contact that can be used to communicate with customers.
Depending on contact type we use these details to send general communication (regular, physical mail) or invoices.
contactGlobalSpecType.title: Contact

payment_methodPaymentMethodRole.description:
Defines if a payment method is used as a primary or backup source of fund.

Unknown payment method role
Primary payment method role. Always used when attempting to charge for Volterra's services.
Secondary payment method role. Used when primary payment method failed.
Normal payment method is a card that has no role as such.
payment_methodPaymentMethodRole.title: Payment method role
